about_the_game:
World View

Mysterious mana overflowing in caves... Adventurers gather crystals of mana and set out for the “core of mana” that lies in the deepest part of the cave. But will the mana bring mankind together or will it bring prosperity? To find the answer, players will challenge the cave!

Real-time Card Battles

In EvilMana, battles progress in real time! Resource recovery, enemy actions, and the passage of phases all occur over time. Enjoy thrilling battles where a split-second decision can make the difference between victory and defeat!

Level Up!

Each adventure starts at level 1, and each level up increases a random status! Each status has a great impact on combat and exploration, so it is important to have a strategy that fits your status!

Titles

Achieve milestones through adventures and unlock titles to equip on your journey. These titles grant various bonuses such as increased stats, encounters with special cards, and even the ability to harness greater mana power.

Deck Construction

More than 100 types of regular cards

Reward cards for defeating bosses

Over 50 types of Relics

Translated with (free version)
